casebody.data:
Hall, Admr., Appellee, v. Cuyahoga County et al., Appellants.

[Cite as Hall v. Cuyahoga Cty. (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 203.]

*204(Nos. 00-844 and 00-955 Submitted February 28, 2001 Decided March 28, 2001.) Nurenberg, Plevin, Heller & McCarthy Co., L.P.A, Richard L. Demsey and Kathleen St. John, for appellee. William D. Mason, Cuyahoga County Prosecuting Attorney, and Kathleen A. Martin, Litigation Manager, Civil Division, for appellant Cuyahoga County. Weston, Hurd, Fallon, Paisley & Howley, L.L.P., and Christopher M. Ernst, for appellant city of North Olmsted.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of Stevens v. Ackman (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 182, 743 N.E.2d 901.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
